nodes.text: Sevik was a male Human, who, along with several other members of his ship's crew, worked to dupe two Weequays into helping them find the treasure of Zelosian's Chine. He and Hanugar were shipwrecked when their vessel ran into one of Zelos II's many coral reefs, where he and Hanugar were forced to fight off melk and wait for co-conspirator K'zk. After finding the treasure, the ship crew left the Weequays for dead, only to have the Weequays swear that they would hunt them down.
